page.title: 16BRIGG CHURCHES (CONTD.)
page.content: taking part. During Christian Aid Week in May each year the Church of England, Roman Catholic and Methodist Churches join forces for a house to house collection for Christian Aid. {Saint Mary's Roman Catholic Church, {Brigg:} {Priest:} Father Steven Lennon P.P. {Catholic Population:} 74O {Mass Attendance: }435 {Baptisms:}l984 - l6 {Marriages:}l984 - 8 {Deaths:}l984 - ll {Mass Times:}Saturday 6.OO pm Sunday 8.30 am (Kirton Barracks) Sunday l0.OO am {Organist:}Mr A Hopkins {Covent:}St Clairs, Grammar School Road {Convent Order:}Poor Clairs of Newry {School:}St Mary's Roman Catholic Primary - Number on Roll: l50
